emerging_technologies.name: Smart Contact Lenses
emerging_technologies.description: Lenses with embedded micro-displays and sensors for AR applications, health monitoring, and digital overlays.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances personal data privacy concerns, potential for social isolation, health benefits from monitoring.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cost, regulatory approval, integration with other devices, user comfort, and eye safety standards.

emerging_technologies.name: Home Energy Management AI
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems that optimize energy use in homes, learning from user behavior to reduce waste and integrate with renewable energy sources.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Promotes energy conservation, reduces carbon footprint, raises concerns about data privacy and control over personal energy use.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cost savings, integration with existing infrastructure, user trust in AI systems, and regulatory support for green technologies.

emerging_technologies.name: Personalized Medicine via Wearables
emerging_technologies.description: Wearable devices providing real-time health data for personalized treatment plans, supported by AI analytics.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for improved health outcomes, privacy concerns with health data, equitable access to technology.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: User health consciousness, insurance incentives, integration with healthcare systems, and regulatory approval.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Delivery Drones
emerging_technologies.description: Drones for last-mile delivery, reducing urban congestion and improving efficiency in parcel delivery.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Job displacement in delivery sectors, noise pollution, privacy issues, urban airspace management.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory acceptance, safety concerns, public perception, and integration with existing logistics networks.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Voice Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: Voice assistants have become ubiquitous, providing advanced home automation, personal assistance, and integration with other smart devices.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread in developed countries, with integration into daily life for controlling home systems, managing schedules, and providing information.

mainstream_technologies.name: Blockchain for Digital Identity
mainstream_technologies.description: Blockchain technology used for secure, decentralized identity verification, reducing fraud and enhancing privacy.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in financial sectors, government services, and online platforms for secure identity management.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on technologies that promote energy efficiency, waste reduction, and sustainable urban development.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Encourages a shift towards a circular economy, raises awareness on climate change, and promotes green technology adoption.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Aligned with global sustainability goals, increasing urban populations, and the demand for smart cities.

epoch_themes.description: Integration of technology for individual health monitoring and personalized medical treatments.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential to reduce healthcare costs, improve patient outcomes, but also raises ethical questions about data ownership and privacy.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increasing focus on preventative healthcare, aging populations, and personalized medicine.
